natural_gas_quant_simulation.title: Quantitative Research Job Simulation - JP Morgan Chase on Forage
bullets: Modeled and extrapolated natural gas prices, incorporating seasonality.

exotic_american_options_vba.title: Exotic and American Options Pricing - VBA
bullets: Implemented Monte Carlo and binomial tree pricing methods.
Calibrated models and analyzed sensitivities (Greeks).

var_expected_shortfall_modeling.title: Market Risk Modeling - VaR and Expected Shortfall
bullets: Implemented VaR and ES using historical, parametric, and Monte Carlo approaches.
Assessed robustness, assumptions, and limitations across the different methods.
Performed stress testing on the Covid-19 period.

rough_volatility_calibration.title: Rough Volatility Calibration - supervised by Pr. Eduardo Abi Jaber
bullets: Implemented a rough volatility model based on the article "Volatility is Rough".
Calibrated the model to implied volatility surfaces and analyzed roughness effects.

options_trading_market_making_akuna.title: Options Trading and Market Making Foundations - Akuna Capital
bullets: Implemented option pricing intuition, Greeks, hedging and P&L dynamics on listed derivatives.
Analyzed market making logic, spreads, risk management and volatility exposure.

leveraged_etf_valuation.title: Leveraged ETF Valuation - supervised by Pr. Nicolas Gaussel
bullets: Modeled leveraged ETF valuation and quantified deviations from the underlying index.
Analyzed sensitivity to volatility, rebalancing effects and path-dependence using historical data.

cfm_market_microstructure_ml.title: Data Challenge - CFM - Market Microstructure and Signal Classification
bullets: Engineered predictive features from high-frequency limit order book data (24 million events).
Applied bi-GRU models to extract market state and microstructure signals.

quant_alpha_crypto.title: Research Project - Quantitative Alpha in Crypto Markets
bullets: Implemented alpha signals from the academic paper "Quantitative Alpha in Crypto Markets".
Backtested long/short BTC-ETH strategies on aggregated historical data.

electricity_price_forecasting.title: Electricity Price Forecasting - France and Germany
bullets: Built time-series and ML models using multi-source alternative datasets.
Monitored performance using Spearman correlation.
Translated model outputs into decision-relevant signals.

algorithmic_trading_market_making.title: Algorithmic Trading Project - supervised by Pr. Olivier Gueant
bullets: Implemented algorithmic market making models for equity derivatives.
Simulated order book dynamics and analyzed P&L performance.
